data.name: Abridge Demo
data.detailed_description:
Abridge is an abstract, block-base puzzle game where the colors and shapes on pieces describe their movement and abilities. Learn how they move and interact with other pieces. Steer all the pieces into the goal and solve these hand-crafted, challenging puzzles.

Features

  • Over 125 hand-crafted levels with growing difficulty
  • Calm, Soothing In-Game Soundtrack
  • Vibrant, Minimalist Aesthetic
  • Keyboard & Mouse and Controller Support

Gameplay

  • Select and move the pieces by using Keyboard & Mouse or Controller (Recommended)
  • Move them all into the goal to solve the puzzle



Pieces can interact with other pieces in many different ways. Play the game to learn what they are.

In-Game Music
"Breathing" by Keys of Moons Music

data.short_description: Abridge is a casual, Sokoban puzzle game. Select pieces to move, pull and push them around into a goal. The colorful shapes on them determine their movement and abilities. Remove them all from the level to solve these hand-crafted, challenging puzzles.
